item.title: Need help, [PI]
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

What i did was, well i rebuilt my yell cause pi yell on my base when i got it was so messy.

i had their acc ranked the rank needed like 1-mod 2-admin 3-owner 0-player
then in the yell system i added a yell rank for their name like this,

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) { String rank = ""; String Message = playerCommand.substring(4).toLowerCase(); if (c.playerRights >= 0) { rank = "[Player] "+ c.playerName +":"; } if (c.playerRights >= 1) { rank = "@whi@[Moderator] "+ c.playerName +":"; } if (c.playerRights >= 2) { rank = "@dre@[Admin] "+ c.playerName +":"; } if (c.playerRights >= 3) { rank = "@red@[Owner] "+ c.playerName +": "; } if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("sarah")) { rank = "@sil@[gfx artist] "+ c.playerName +":"; } if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("silicafan")) { rank = "@yel@[donater] "+ c.playerName +":"; } if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("masked pk3rr")) { rank = "@yel@[Donater] "+ c.playerName +":"; } if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("hitchdawgg")) { rank = "@dre@[admin] "+ c.playerName +":"; } if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("rob")) { rank = "@yel@[Donater] "+ c.playerName +":"; } if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("x b1 x")) { rank = "@yel@[Donater] "+ c.playerName +":"; } if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("el muerte")) { rank = "@red@[john doe] "+ c.playerName +":"; }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:5, topic:373589”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=469589.msg3433517#msg3433517 date=1292554179]
Developer has never been added to Project-Insanity.
[/quote]

However, you can add a title beside your name that says “Developer”.[/quote]
Yes, that can be done in Commands.Java. Other than that, it has never been added as a default right in the right’s thing, I don’t remember what it’s called.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

Developer has never been added to Project-Insanity.

However, you can add a title beside your name that says “Developer”.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Developer has never been added to Project-Insanity.

0 - Regular Member
1 - Moderator
2 - Administrator
3 - Owner
4 - Hidden Owner

Read full topic
